title: Toofan Harirod F.C.
text:
Toofan Harirod (<a href="Persian%20language">Persian</a>: ) or the Harirod Storm is a professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> team from <a href="Afghanistan">Afghanistan</a>. They play in the <a href="Afghan%20Premier%20League">Afghan Premier League</a>. It was founded in August 2012, by the creation of Afghan Premier League and its players were chosen through a casting-show called Maidan-E-Sabz (Green Field). Based in the city of <a href="Herat">Herat</a>, the club represents provinces of <a href="Herat%20Province">Herat</a>, <a href="Farah%20Province">Farah</a>, <a href="Ghor%20Province">Ghor</a> and <a href="Badghis%20Province">Badghis</a> in the western region of Afghanistan.
Toofan Harirod became champions of the first season of Premier League, defeating <a href="Simorgh%20Alborz%20F.C.">Simorgh Alborz</a> 2–1, in final of the <a href="2012%20Afghan%20Premier%20League">2012 Afghan Premier League</a>. They earned their second and third title against <a href="Shaheen%20Asmayee%20F.C.">Shaheen Asmayee</a> in final of the <a href="2018%20Afghan%20Premier%20League">2018 Afghan Premier League</a> and <a href="2019%20Afghan%20Premier%20League">2019 Afghan Premier League</a> through extra time, by score of 1–0.
